title: Can we make dua in Sujood as Sahu if we forgot to make it before
transcript: a questioner says can we make dua in sujud if we forget to make it before no problem you can make dua in any sujud whether it's jude in your thought prayer whether it's in your nephili prayer or voluntary prayer whether it is in tilawa the subjudo recitation or the sujud of gratitude and also also the situate of a sahu and allah azzawajal knows best you
